text: Andrey Arkhipov (Russian: Андрей Архипов; 21 April 1931 - 12 January 2017) was a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne with the men's coxed four where they were eliminated in the semi-final. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1956 Summer Olympics
title: Andrey Arkhipov
